name: Ext_R2_Device_udi
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.Device.udi for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Device.udi from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: United States Food and Drug Administration mandated Unique Device Identifier (UDI). Use the human readable information (the content that the user sees, which is sometimes different to the exact syntax represented in the barcode)  - see http://www.fda.gov/MedicalDevices/DeviceRegulationandGuidance/UniqueDeviceIdentification/default.htm.
element.comment: `Device.udi` maps to R4 `Device.udiCarrier`. Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget.
